params.allowedAddressToAcceptOrder: Allowed address to accept order (address(0) if any address can accept order)
params.orderEndTime: Order end time (0 if order is lasting infinitely)
params.orderStartTime: Order start time (0 if order is started immediately)
params.sellingTokenAddress: Selling token address (address(0) if native eth currency is used)

params.allowedAddressToAcceptOrder: New allowed address to accept order (address(0) if any address can accept order)
params.orderEndTime: New order end time (0 if order is lasting infinitely)
params.orderStartTime: New order start time (0 if order is started immediately)
params.sellingTokenAddress: New selling token address (address(0) if native eth currency is used)

acceptOrder(uint256,(bytes32,uint256)[]).details: Transfers banner id to msg.sender for provided amount of tokens (if ERC20 - they need to be approved beforehand, if native - they have to be sent to this function)

params.minBuildingsSharesToReceive: Minimum amount of building shares to receive with orders' banner

cancelOrder(uint256).details: Can be called by order owner OR order owner is not banner owner (anyone can cancel order if order is not valid)

createOrder(uint256,address,uint256,addr.details: Creates order for specified amount of tokens

params.allowedAddressToAcceptOrder: Allowed address to accept order (address(0) if any address can accept order)
params.orderEndTime: Order end time (0 if order is lasting infinitely)
params.orderStartTime: Order start time (0 if order is started immediately)
params.sellingTokenAddress: Selling token address (address(0) if native eth currency is used)

modifyOrder(uint256,address,uint256,addr.details: Selling token address, price can be modified; banner id cannot be modified

params.allowedAddressToAcceptOrder: New allowed address to accept order (address(0) if any address can accept order)
params.orderEndTime: New order end time (0 if order is lasting infinitely)
params.orderStartTime: New order start time (0 if order is started immediately)
params.sellingTokenAddress: New selling token address (address(0) if native eth currency is used)

orders.details: Modified when #createOrder or #acceptOrder or #cancelOrder is called

CannotAcceptExpiredOrder().notice: Thrown when attempting to accept order if 'orderDetails.orderEndTime' exist and order is already expired

CannotAcceptNotNewOrder().notice: Thrown when attempting to accept order with non NEW status

CannotAcceptNotStartedOrder().notice: Thrown when attempting to accept order if 'orderDetails.orderStartTime' exist and order is not started

CannotAcceptOrderByNotAllowedAddress().notice: Thrown when attempting to accept order if 'orderDetails.allowedAddressToAcceptOrder' exist and msg.sender is not that address

CannotAcceptOrderByProvidingNotExactPric.notice: Thrown when attempting to accept order without providing exact amount of tokens for it

CannotAcceptOrderWithSharesToReceiveLowe.notice: Thrown when attempting to accept order with shares to receive in the process lower than specified

CannotCancelActiveOrderIfCallerNotOrderO.notice: Thrown when attempting to cancel order if caller is not order owner and order owner owns banner

CannotCancelNonNewOrder().notice: Thrown when attempting to cancel non NEW order

CannotCreateOrderForBannerMoreThanOnce().notice: Thrown when attempting to create order for one banner more than once

CannotCreateOrderForNotOwnedBanner().notice: Thrown when attempting to create order while not owning banner which will be traded

CannotModifyNonNewOrder().notice: Thrown when attempting to modify non NEW order

CannotModifyOrderByNonOrderOwner().notice: Thrown when attempting to modify order by caller who is not order owner

OrderCancelled(uint256).notice: Emitted when #cancelOrder is called (can be emitted when #createOrder is called once again after banner owner is changed)

bannersOrders(uint256).notice: Mapping containing link from banner id to order id

lastOrderId().notice: Lastly created order id (0 if no orders is created)

orders(uint256).notice: Mapping containing order id to related OrderDetails struct

userdoc.notice: Functions related to selling settlements for specific amount of tokens
